name: Tom Hardy
description: Prominent British actor known for his versatile roles in major films.

content.title: Biography
content.body: **Tom Hardy** was born in 1977 in Hammersmith, London, England. He studied acting at the Drama Centre London and began his career in feature films in the early 2000s. His breakthrough role came with the movie _Bronson_, where his transformation into the title character showcased his commitment and talent.

content.title: Career
content.body: Tom Hardy's career has been marked by a series of varied and intense roles. He gained international recognition for his role as Eames in _Inception_ (2010) and further established himself as a leading actor with his portrayals of Bane in _The Dark Knight Rises_ (2012) and the title character in _Mad Max: Fury Road_ (2015). Hardy is known for his immersive acting style and his ability to transform physically and vocally for his roles.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Hardy has frequently collaborated with director Christopher Nolan on films such as _Inception_ and _The Dark Knight Rises_. He has also worked multiple times with director Steven Knight, notably in the film _Locke_ and the TV series _Peaky Blinders_.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Tom Hardy's impact on the film industry is marked by his dynamic range and his deep dedication to his craft. He has been nominated for several awards, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in _The Revenant_ (2015).
